docs.snippet: A worker at a World Cup stadium in Brazil died in an electrical accident on Thursday, temporarily interrupting construction at one of the most-delayed sites only five weeks before the tournament is scheduled to begin June 12....

docs.abstract: Worker at World Cup stadium in Brazil dies in electrical accident, temporarily halting construction at the site only five weeks before the tournament is scheduled to begin June 12; other soccer items noted.
